item.description:
The Hartford Farmers' Markets invite you to the Elizabeth Park Rose Weekend Farmers' Market! Come and see the beautiful roses of Elizabeth Park while supporting local farmers and vendors and enjoying arts and crafts activities including a free yoga class from West Hartford Yoga from 11am-12pm! Also, please note that the market WILL be accepting SNAP benefits.

The Rose Weekend Farmers' Market will be a great way to kick off the 2012 market season! We hope to see you there!

Participating farmers and vendors include:

Killam & Bassette Farmstead
Grow Hartford
Farmers' Cow
Stonewall Apiary
Maplewoods Farm
Shadow Valley Farm
Cato Corner Farm
Urban Oaks Organic Farm
The Farm on Grindle Brook
Fabyon Sugar Shack
Boxed Goodes, LCC
Norm's Best
Woodward Greenhouses
New Leaf Pottery
Sleepy Moon Soaps
Simone Signatures
Now and Then
Sewing Circle Project
Junes Knit Designs and Stuff
Dijaro Designs
Chet's Italian Ice
Keifer's Kettle Korn
Alchemy Juice Bar
item.how_to_find_us: This is more of a free form event for us, go and have fun, if you see a gal with a cane it might be me.
item.name: Elizabeth Park Rose Weekend Farmers' Market
